segments.text: What qualities do you think a business manager should possess ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Creativity , the ability to organize , the entrepreneur's spirit , comprehensive knowledge of human studies , ability of gathering information , expert competence of communication and deep professional skills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If a client complains about the service of your department , what will you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I'm in the service center . I'll listen to the client patiently , and accept the criticism objectively . Then I will have the claim reasonably settled .
segments.speaker: S2
